introduction: Ismaeil is living with his son Ali and his daughter Sona. His wife passed away and his friends are insisting on him to get marry again. In school Ali's friend is complaining abut his step mother who beats him making Ali in deep fear of step mothers. Finally Ismaeil gets marry with Astar who is a teacher. Although she is very friendly and cares for the children Ali is resisting her and is aggressive with her. But little by little they get more close to each other.
